reviews.review: Fun game, but if you want to play with a lot of friends (more than 4), it's not for you.
this is a good multiplayer horror game if your looking for a game that has thrills and can give you a good time play this game

10/10 recommend this game, its one of the best ones. i love it so much as well as the characters in it, i would love to see some more horror icons added!

Love this game.
I was worried that I won't be able to play cause it's kinda scary, but it was fine. 
I love characters and perks. 
It's fun to play both survs and killers. I prefer survs more. Those are really fun.
My favourite ones are Claudette and Jake. 
Killers... Hm, I love Plague. She is amazing =)
Игра очень даже хороша. Есть некоторые глуповатые баги , но игра класная. Хотя мои слова пока что пустышки. Я наиграл всего 30 часов

絶対にお勧めしません

La verdad, el juego es muy bueno, es entretenido y siempre tienes que estar atento a lo que no lo hace aburrido. Mucha variedad de personajes y perks. 

Lo recomiendo mucho, no les recomiendo pagar ARS$ 224,99 a menos que este en oferta porque hay muchos otros juegos que se pueden aprovechar con esa plata. Pero sin duda este es el mejor.
Fun Interesting Game, has balance issues that seem to be way to slow to adjust

ME ENCANTO por su accion en cada momento por que tienes que ver quien es el asesino por el tipo de golpe en serio pero espero que el dlc de ash vs evil dead espero que pongan a un zombie por la serie de tv para comprarlo por que nomas tiene un personaje como que muy caro
PELOTUDITAAAAAAAAAA, TOMA TBAG! PISTOLAAAAAAA QUE ME GANAS A MI, TE TBAGEO TODO HASTA QUE TE MUERAS VAS A SALUDAR A LA CAMARA MALDITA!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
怎么说，应该玩了这个游戏的人都会喜欢
this game is a very good one. playing both sides are equally fun but require different playstyles. amazing game

I have had loads of fun playing this game, mainly as the killer but also sometimes as the survivor. The survivor is for sure better to play with friends because the communication helps a lot. There are many different survivors and killers with all kinds of different perks and consumables to really spice up each match. Some people can be a little toxic but It used to be way worse but now there are a bit more sweethearts!
Solo queue takes forever meanwhile with party only 1-5 mins it doesn't make any sense. Overall good game, balance enough

Jogo extremamente divertido. Até você descer seu rank. Aí fica frustrante. Minha reclamação desse jogo é a quantidade de BP que um killer ganha por partida em favor do sobrevivente. É muito desproporcional.
This game is amazing! So addictive:)
fun game, might rage but fun game.

ta weno, la comunidad es diversa, aunque abundan los afk cuando son los primeros en ser colgados, me da miedito, cumple su funcion.
 9/10 por los afk.
In the beginning i hated it, then i took a break and got the feel of it. Now I love it.

GOOD~具体评测要等一年 目前体验良好
音效；真实 有手感
画面：低配党也可以用低画并用良好画质和很好的效率运行
游戏性；良好，很困难有难度
平衡性；很差 作为非对称竞技这个游戏处理的一团糟
坑爹情况；很坑 低阶可以被花钱买的dlc的屠夫完虐当然dlc人类也可以虐普通屠夫
 总评；花瓶游戏 画质效率都不错 音效也很佳 但平衡性一团糟，烂的不行。 
                      总体分数；满分10分 得 6分 及格 但 有提升空间
    6分就推荐大家在打折的时候玩一下

It's everything you want
It's everything you need
It's everything inside of you
That you wish you could be
It says all the right things
At exactly the right time
But it means nothing to you
And you don't know why

This game is like hide and seek, tag, and capture the flag all rolled into one. It's great. You got friends? Cool, play as a survivor. You don't got friends like me? Play as a Killer.

Beware the toxic community. Those fool be trying to tell you how to play the game. Git gud, noobz.
